title: Tapping "Retake" should take use back to the content type they were previously using
description:
Steps to replicate:

1. Open composer
2. Navigate to capture a video
3. Take a short video with your phone
4. You don't like the video, so you press "Retake"
5. Notice you get taken to the Image capture screen. You should land on the Video capture screen since this is where you were before.

milestone.title: Mobile 4.3.0
milestone.description:
- [ ] Plus 2020
- [ ] New newsfeed
- [ ] Bug fixes

title: App audio setting should override phone audio setting
description:
Example:

- User has phone on silent mode (iOS)
- User scrolls to video on Minds app and presses play
- Video should play muted by default (this currently is how it works)
- If user unmutes video, the sound should turn on regardless of whether phone is in silent mode.
- All videos on Minds app should inherit the same audio setting from the last post.

title: Low resolution images from gallery
description:
### Summary

After attaching an image from the gallery in the new composer the result images has very low resolution

Reported by @Johnthetester 

### Steps to reproduce

Select images from the gallery on iOS


### Platform information 

iOS

### Possible fixes

Disable crop option for composer

title: Endless loading screen for new user in USD transactions
description:
If you are a new user or have no USD transactions, it shows an endless loading sign.

Instead it should just show text that says "You do not have any transactions"

milestone.title: Maintenance::06/01-06/12
milestone.description: Maintenance sprint

title: Remove ability to switch camera when recording
description:
If you are capturing a video and try to press the flip camera icon, it makes the video stop recording.

Ideally, users should be able to do this mid video. If this is a longer-term fix, then perhaps just remove the ability to do so while capturing a video. However, it is much better and industry standard to have this capability for taking videos.

To replicate:
1. Open composer and switch to video
2. Press record
3. Press flip camera while recording


![RPReplay_Final1591028680](/uploads/799d87f7cbd9a35a7e66379a88a5b85b/RPReplay_Final1591028680.MP4)

title: Onboarding crashes after selecting hashtags
description:
There are two crash points when trying to create a new user and complete onboarding.

The first crash occurs due to fast swiping immediately after you create an account #2216 - it seems like we unnecessarily have screens swiping in and out. It should just load and have the first onboarding screen automatically up when a user first signs up. After that, every time they open the app it should just be on newsfeed or wherever they were last. 

The second crash occurs after you press Next after selecting hashtags (see video).  

![RPReplay_Final1591026761](/uploads/35899cffea21697488a52b91b6bad912/RPReplay_Final1591026761.MP4)

Error:

title: Cannot play video preview after capturing video from phone
description:
Steps to replicate:

1. Open composer on iPhone
2. Take a video from your phone
3. Notice that you are unable to watch the preview of the video when deciding to Confirm or Retake
4. Press confirm. When you try to play the video from within the preview, the app crashes and gives white screen (error below)

Video:

![RPReplay_Final1591026214](/uploads/cfae6e1865acbda9236a5e571ef6e995/RPReplay_Final1591026214.MP4)

  at call (src/compose/Poster.js:50:13)
  at callImmediates (app:///[native code])
  at value (app:///[native code])

(15 additional frame(s) were not displayed)
